Package it.polimi.ingsw.commons

Class LeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.commons.LeaderCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LeaderCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class representing a physical leader card, that can be either activated or discarded by player during a turn.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String ID
    The unique ID identifying the card.
    private boolean isActive
    The activation status of the card.
    private LeaderEffect leaderEffect
    The LeaderEffect associated to this card.
    private java.util.List<CardType> requirementsCards
    The DevelopmentCard types and occurrences needed to activate this card.
    private java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> requirementsResources
    The ResourceType types and occurrences needed to activate this card.
    private int victoryPoints
    The number of victory points earned by the player who buys it.

      public LeaderCard​(LeaderEffect leaderEffect, java.util.Map<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> requirementsResources, java.util.List<CardType> requirementsCards, int victoryPoints)
      This custom constructor is used only for test purposes. Original leader cards are instead loaded parsing them from an external json source.
